title: Pakistani Scientist A.Q. Khan, Who Secretly Sold Nuclear-Weapons Technology, Dies at 85
content:
1. Pakistani Scientist A.Q. Khan, Who Secretly Sold Nuclear-Weapons Technology, Dies at 85  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Abdul Qadeer Khan: 'Father of Pakistan's nuclear bomb' dies  BBC News
  3. Pakistan's AQ Khan, who illegally sold nuclear technology to Iran, Libya and N Korea, passes away  Hindustan Times
  4. Opinion | Joe Biden may hurt Imran Khan’s oversized ego, but won’t go far enough to hurt Pakistan  Firstpost
  5. Abdul Qadeer Khan, Father of Pakistan’s Nuclear Program, Dies at 85  The New York Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 訃報】パキスタンの科学者A.Q.カーン氏、核兵器技術を秘密裏に販売していたが85歳で死去
秘密出售核武器技术的巴基斯坦科学家A.Q. Khan去世，享年85岁
祕密出售核武器技術的巴基斯坦科學家A.Q. Khan去世，享年85歲
